◆ hScrollEventDataMonitor

cydui::events::change_ev::DataMonitor< ScrollEvent > hScrollEventDataMonitor([](ScrollEvent::DataType &o_data, ScrollEvent::DataType &n_data) { n_data.dx+=o_data.dx;return true;},[](ScrollEvent::DataType &data) { data.dx=0;}) ( [] (ScrollEvent::DataType &o_data, ScrollEvent::DataType &n_data) { n_data.dx+=o_data.dx;return true;}  ,
[] (ScrollEvent::DataType &data) { data.dx=0;}   
)

This prevents the event thread from chocking on scroll events.

Note
It does impose a limit on the scroll speed to 64 units per frame in either direction

◆ vScrollEventDataMonitor

This prevents the event thread from chocking on scroll events.

Note
It does impose a limit on the scroll speed to 64 units per frame in either direction
